# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

The following versions of MeridianAlgo are currently being supported with security updates:

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 6.0.x   | Yes                |
| 5.x.x   | No                 |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

We take the security of MeridianAlgo seriously. If you believe you have found a security vulnerability, please report it to us as follows:

1.  **Do not open a public issue.**
2.  Email your report to **security@meridianalgo.com**.

Please include the following in your report:

-   A description of the vulnerability and its potential impact.
-   Steps to reproduce the issue.
-   Any potential fixes or mitigations you are aware of.

We will acknowledge receipt of your report within 48 hours and provide a timeline for addressing the issue. We ask that you keep the report confidential until we have had a chance to fix the vulnerability and release an update.

Thank you for helping keep MeridianAlgo secure.
